website_summaries.verdict: If you are wanting to find a pair of kicks with a classic and stylish look, the Reebok Workout Clean with a low-top silhouette is an excellent addition to your arsenal. Apart from its fashion-forward trait, this kind of Reebok Workout sneakers also offers the right amount of comfort and support needed for performance as well as for casual activities. Made of quality materials, the Reebok Workout Clean will ensure that you enjoy comfortable strides while maintaining your fashion-forward look.
pros: The low-top Reebok Workout Clean is up for grabs at an affordable price
Most of the consumers have found this footwear comfortable to wear
It is a stylish pair of sneakers, as commented by some of the purchasers
Some of the testers have perceived that the low-top Reebok Workout Clean is made of the quality and good materials
It is among the Reebok sneakers that provide reliable support, as attested by a user
A reviewer has testified that it is a lightweight pair of shoes
cons: The Reebok Workout Clean fits a bit narrower than expected, noted by a few buyers

customer_reviews.title: Great $25 pair of gym shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I always try to weigh performance and affordability when it comes to gym shoes. I give my gym shoes a pretty intense beating and inevitably run through them pretty quickly. I expect these to hold up quite well for longer than expected. I normally wear a size 11.5-12 but was told to buy a size smaller. The fit, width wise, was perfect but for some reason the length appears to be a bit longer than expected. Definitely not a deal breaker. I'm not crazy about the pinkish/reddish color either but also definitely not a deal breaker for $25. I would recommend these if you're just using them for working out or casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool color and not too bright!!
customer_reviews.text: This model always fits perfectly on me (size 8US) and I normally buy the standard white colorway but the red looked interesting and at $25 why not give them a shot. The red isn’t as bright as the picture but that’s actually better to be able to coordinate with what I’m wearing. Pretty pleased with these for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Joe90

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable an fit perfect !!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pair an i wear 1 pair an the 2nd pair looks like someone ripped the front open an tried to repair it with glue !! They fit perfect an i love how comfortable they are an i just want to exchange these for another pair !! I cant believe this pair looks like this i just want to exchange these for a pair of new shoes not used ! Please
customer_reviews.author: SCARFO

customer_reviews.title: ... with shoes but these Reebok's are one of the best for comfort and support
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time with shoes but these Reebok's are one of the best for comfort and support.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: Get them!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect for lifting/squatting. Very firm sole. I can’t believe they were so cheap. I have other Reebok/crossfit shoes but these are my favorite. Not good for running. I’m a women’s 8.5 and I ordered a men’s 6.5 fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked these kix! Not disappointed. Comfy and stylish!!
customer_reviews.author: Uso Moni

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes alot. The only problem i see is the wrinkles its gets in the front of the shoes. The more you use it more wrinkles come up. I wonder how the shoes will look in a year. I did notice other reviewers had similar problems.
customer_reviews.author: Juan C

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for weight lifting and they are perfect. Nice flat soles, very supportive insole, and comfortable. The insole distributes the weight evenly. The toe box is roomy.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: You get what you see! : )
customer_reviews.text: This is a happy buy for my son, quality shoes that look great with an even better price attached to them. Yes! well worth the price and they look so nice on my son's foot.
customer_reviews.author: Feefee

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe but runs small
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and design. I get a lot of complements when I wear them. I have had mine for a week now. The only con is they do not really stretch like I was hoping they would. When you buy these I recommend buying a half size up. I may not be able to wear them as much as I would like because after time they do start to hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Broc

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality......the soles are thick I bought these for My Son He's a UPS Driver and He loves them since He's on His feet all Day
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Look good, but they were a bit tight, smashed my toe. Wouldn't hurt if they were a little wider.
customer_reviews.author: willie robles

customer_reviews.title: Cut rubber
customer_reviews.text: I received the item with cut rubber and seems that someone was trying to cure it as the adhesive appears.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit 😊
customer_reviews.text: I received these today, and am wearing them now. I wear size 12, but I could only get the 12.5, and they fit very well. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine Walker

customer_reviews.title: Finishing details were poor but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very nice great quality till you get down to finishing detail. Looks like the glue didn’t hold so they tried to glue it again with more and there’s glue on the shoe. The shoe is nice and fits great very comfortable but has glue on the side of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolas Olivares

customer_reviews.title: Two different kinds do not make a pair .
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box I saw I had two different shoes. Both Reebok both blue but one had white trim and soles the other had gum. Unmistakable to anyone packing the box that cared at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great service, great product. My husband loves them. Will come back agaain.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Belcherwheeler

customer_reviews.title: Probably fake.
customer_reviews.text: Leather is basically cracking and falling apart. I own three other pairs of these and none of them have worn the way these have. After a week and two days wear the leather is creased and looks terrible. Almost certain this was a fake. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Made real cheap only worn ones and the front creased
customer_reviews.author: ROZAY

customer_reviews.title: Color all wrong
customer_reviews.text: Not at all the color represented online. It's a light grey color, not at all like pictured. I sent them back and I've worn Reeboks forever
customer_reviews.author: Chris Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: First day of wearing these they began to get wrinkles in the toe. Poor quality. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Reebok 👍
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved them! Got them for him as a gift. Great fit and material is well made!
customer_reviews.author: Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting shoes. Looking to buy more
customer_reviews.text: Always LOVED REEBOKS thanks to Amazon the love never be lost. They look good feel good and their easy on the pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin Snider

customer_reviews.title: Color red too dark
customer_reviews.text: Color was too dark when they arrived. They run pretty small also. But I liked the shoe itself.
customer_reviews.author: jay and Chevy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than it was supposed to be the front was way too tight
customer_reviews.author: sandysantana

customer_reviews.title: How do I return
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was bent, scuffed, and had dents on right foot
customer_reviews.author: Hurshul

customer_reviews.title: Defective shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shoes but one of the shoes is defective, you can notice right away.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Wears out quick
customer_reviews.text: They just wore out faster then I thought they would
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Workout Clean Cross Trainer
